MAN.TITLE: formatman
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: translates old NROFF man files in a directory into ascii, tex, html or xml

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : character string, giving the path of the directory

DESCRIPTION.P: This function, not yet fully checked, formats old help files (*.man) of a given directory, written in a subset of NROFF, to ascii, tex, html or xml.
NOTE: this function is obsolete and MUST ONLY be used to translate old NROFF help files into new XML help files.

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.label: ascii
DESCRIPTION_ITEM.SP: mode generates a .cat file for each .man file and a whatis file

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.label: tex
DESCRIPTION_ITEM.SP: mode generates a .tex file for each .man file and a whatis.tex file

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.label: html
DESCRIPTION_ITEM.SP: mode generates a .html file for each .man file and a index.html file

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.label: xml
DESCRIPTION_ITEM.SP: mode generates a .xml file for each .man file
